summary: A single movie stuntman attempts to save the marriage of his hen-pecked brother.
cast: Kamal Haasan|Simran|Abbas|Sneha|Ramesh Khanna|Vaiyapuri|Manivannan|Kalpana|Madhan Bob|Charlie|Sukumari|T.P. Gajendran|Pandu|R.S. Shivaji|Yugi Sethu|Santhana Bharathi|Kavithalaya Krishnan|Kuyili|Crazy Mohan|Unnikrishnan Nampoothiri|Neelu|M.N. Rajam|Bayilvan Ranganathan|Ravichandran|Sriman
title: Pammal K. Sambandam
